title: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers | Science & Engineering Kit | Build 20 Models | Learn about Force, Load, Compression, Tension | Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, Blue
descriptions:

Category: Science & Engineering Kit

Color: Blue

Product Details:

- Models to Build: 20

This Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering kit is a comprehensive science and engineering kit that allows you to explore the fascinating world of bridges and skyscrapers. With 20 models to build and 285 pieces, this kit provides hands-on learning experiences for intermediate skill levels.

The kit has been recognized with the prestigious Parents' Choice Gold Award, ensuring its high quality and educational value. Through a series of 20 model-building experiments, you will learn the fundamental concepts of force, load, compression, and tension. The kit covers various structural elements such as columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary.

You will also explore different forces including tension, compression, shear, and bending. The kit introduces you to various bridge types such as truss bridges, arch bridges, cantilever bridges, rope bridges, and suspension bridges.

The illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide, spanning 36 pages, provide clear instructions and guidance throughout your learning journey. With this kit, you will gain a deeper understanding of mechanical physics, structural engineering, and the strength and stability of structures. Additionally, you will learn about the strength and stiffness of materials and optimization for safety and cost.

Overall, the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers kit offers a fun and educational experience, allowing you to build models, conduct experiments, and develop a strong foundation in structural engineering.

Introducing the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers Science & Engineering Kit! This award-winning kit is designed to teach intermediate level learners about the fascinating world of structural engineering. 

With this kit, you can build 20 different models including bridges and skyscrapers, allowing you to explore the concepts of force, load, compression, and tension. The kit includes 285 pieces, such as columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary elements, to help you create realistic and sturdy structures. 

The kit covers various force types, including tension, compression, shear, and bending, allowing you to understand the different forces at play in structural engineering. It also introduces you to different bridge types, such as truss, arch, cantilever, rope, and suspension bridges, giving you a comprehensive overview of the field.

The Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering kit comes with a 36-page illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide, providing step-by-step instructions for building the models. It also includes valuable information on mechanical physics, structural engineering, the strength and stability of structures, as well as the strength and stiffness of materials. 

This kit has received the prestigious Parents' Choice Gold Award, ensuring its quality and educational value. It is suitable for intermediate level learners and is a great tool for aspiring engineers and architects to explore and understand the principles of structural engineering.
